Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The user wants me to create a list of open-ended questions to ask an interviewee about their property onboarding process. Based on the detailed description provided, I need to formulate questions that: 1. Uncover missing details 2. Understand decision criteria 3. Clarify roles and responsibilities 4. Verify timing and sequencing 5. Learn about exception handling

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The description covers: - Initial landlord contact and documentation review - Property data entry into central database - Property manager assignment based on various factors - Introductory meeting between manager and landlord - Photographer and inspector scheduling - Marketing materials creation - Property activation in rental portal - Tenant screening process - Lease finalization - Quality checks and internal audits - Communication tracking

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: I should NOT ask about SQL queries or implementation details - only conceptual understanding questions.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me structure these questions in a clear, organized format. Ill use English throughout since the users request is in English. Ill create a comprehensive list organized by topic phase of the process, making sure each question is open-ended and focused on clarifying understanding.
